properties.name: booking.properties.spring-rabbitmq-host
properties.description: The hostname or IP address of the RabbitMQ server used for event messaging.

properties.name: booking.properties.spring-rabbitmq-port
properties.description: The port number on which the RabbitMQ server is running (default: 5672).

properties.name: booking.properties.spring-rabbitmq-username
properties.description: The username used for authenticating with the RabbitMQ server.

properties.name: booking.properties.spring-rabbitmq-password
properties.description: The password used for authenticating with the RabbitMQ server.

properties.name: booking.properties.mongo-uri
properties.description: The MongoDB connection URI including host, port, and authentication credentials.

properties.name: booking.properties.database-name
properties.description: The name of the MongoDB database to use for the booking application.

properties.name: booking.properties.mail-register-confirmation-link
properties.description: The base URL for the email confirmation link sent to users during registration.

properties.name: booking.properties.app-email
properties.description: The email address used as the sender for all application-generated emails.

properties.name: booking.properties.mail-modified-username
properties.description: The base URL for the notification link sent when a username has been modified.

properties.name: booking.properties.jwt-secret-key
properties.description: The secret key used for signing and verifying JWT tokens for authentication and authorization.
